‘Bang after bang’: Kiwi journalist in Beirut as Israeli air strikes hit Lebanon’s capital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bang-after-bang-kiwi-journalist-in-beirut-as-israeli-air-attacks-strike-lebanons-capital/BQCSTPTD65DWHC6KKY3M3Q3IJE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bang-after-bang-kiwi-journalist-in-beirut-as-israeli-air-attacks-strike-lebanons-capital/BQCSTPTD65DWHC6KKY3M3Q3IJE/ Cherie Howie'It was just bang after bang after bang, and the building shaking.' A source close to Hezbollah said the massive Israeli strikes on Beirut's southern suburbs flattened six buildings. Photo / Ibrahim AMRO / AFP
